name: meeting-summarizer
description: Chrome extension to summarize meetings and web pages

scripts.build:fixhtml: mv dist/src/*.html dist/ && rmdir dist/src 2>/dev/null || true && sed -i 's|\.\./|./|g' dist/popup.html dist/offscreen.html
scripts.build: npm run build:pages && npm run build:content && npm run build:background && npm run build:fixhtml
